mapper.sql: select inventory_id as inventoryId, title as title, groups_id as groupsId, inventory_used as inventoryUsed, last_modify_time as lastModifyTime, inventory_number as inventoryNumber, inventory_totle as inventoryTotle, last_modify_user as lastModifyUser, update_time as updateTime from cmdb_resource_inventory WHERE 1=1
mapper.insert: insert into cmdb_resource_inventory( inventory_id, title, groups_id, last_modify_time, inventory_number, inventory_totle, last_modify_user, update_time ) values( #{inventoryId}, #{title}, #{groupsId}, #{lastModifyTime}, #{inventoryNumber}, #{inventoryTotle}, #{lastModifyUser}, #{updateTime} )
mapper.update: update cmdb_resource_inventory set title=#{title}, groups_id=#{groupsId}, last_modify_time=#{lastModifyTime}, inventory_number=#{inventoryNumber}, inventory_totle=#{inventoryTotle}, last_modify_user=#{lastModifyUser}, update_time=#{updateTime}, inventory_used=#{inventoryUsed} where inventory_id=#{inventoryId}
